TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UIPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class UIPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class UIPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type UIPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the Clipboard.

span.span: Controls the permissions related to user interfaces and the Clipboard.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Windows 中的绘制和用户输入的事件是用户界面。Drawing and user input events in windows are user interfaces. 使用 windows 的权限可以是以下之一： 不受限制，限制为，则只，或没有绘制的窗口或用户输入事件允许的访问。The permission to use windows can be one of the following: unrestricted, limited to , only , or no window drawing or user input event access allowed. 和标题和大小，以避免通过潜在的有害代码可能欺骗限制。 and are restricted in title and size to prevent possible spoofing by potentially harmful code. 使用剪贴板的权限可以是以下之一： 没有剪贴板访问权限允许或不受限制，只写。The permission to use the Clipboard can be one of the following: unrestricted, write-only, or no Clipboard access allowed. 粘贴限制阻止可能有害的应用程序而无需用户的同意，同时仍允许剪切、 复制和粘贴操作时由用户通过键盘命令启动剪贴板中获取数据。The paste limitation prevents potentially harmful applications from taking data from the Clipboard without the user's consent, while still allowing the cut, copy, and paste operations when initiated by the user through keyboard commands.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下两个权限的交集是描述组的二者共同描述的操作的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 具体而言，它表示的权限级别最低值和中当前权限和指定的权限。Specifically, it represents the least permissive values of and from those in the current permission and the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

span.span: Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果成功用于当前权限的所有要求也成功都完成指定的权限，则当前权限是指定权限的子集。The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if all demands that succeed for the current permission also succeed for the specified permission. 它是指定的权限至少包含的子集中包含的权限。That is, the specified permission contains at least the permissions contained in the subset. 有关返回`true`，这两个和当前权限的值必须等于或比指定权限的值不太宽松。For to return `true`, both the and values of the current permission must be equal to or less permissive than the values of the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对权限所保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对的调用结果是表示由当前的权限表示的所有操作，以及由指定权限表示的所有操作的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by the current permission as well as all the operations represented by the specified permission. 具体而言，它表示的最大权限值和中当前权限和指定的权限。Specifically, it represents the most permissive values of and from those in the current permission and the specified permission. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example shows the behavior of the method. 此示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example provided for the class. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例旨在演示方法，不是为了演示其用法的行为。The code example is intended to show the behavior of the method, not to demonstrate its use. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications.
